Room.Name: Mountain Trail
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the mountain trail on the eastern side of the mountain.
Room.LongDescription: The Nellan Mountain Range spans to the north and southeast, expanding nearly indefinitely. It seems to form the border around the Ituk Glacier. There is a small path leading down onto the Glacier. Due to the dangerous and deadly conditions of the glacier, only experienced players may venture down into the icy realm.
